thread.title: DUP and Sinn Féin criticise TUV plans to reduce numbers and cap on special advisers' pay
thread.title_full: DUP and Sinn Féin criticise TUV plans to reduce numbers and cap on special advisers' pay - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: DUP and Sinn Féin criticise TUV plans to reduce numbers and cap on special advisers' pay
text: The DUP and Sinn Féin have criticised a bill brought by the TUV MLA Jim Allister which would reduce the cap on special advisers' pay and cut the number of special advisors at Stormont . The assembly is having its first full debate on the
